content: "Ti piace questo quadro?" "Sì, ma credo che la cornice sia più cara della stampa. Dove l'hai comprato?"
translations: eng:Do you like this painting﹖ Yes, but I think the frame is more expensive than the picture. Where did you buy it﹖
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Guybrush88 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
